alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 8:05PM EDT until July 23 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 805 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parma, or near Cleveland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, North Royalton, Warrensville Heights, Highland Hills, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights, South Euclid, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights, Brook Park, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Lyndhurst, University Heights and Bedford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
